name: Nothing Strange About This Farming Simulator
name_original: Nothing Strange About This Farming Simulator
description:
Help Wanted: Farm Hand

Responsibilities: Wrangling rabbits and tending turnips. Typical farm stuff. Grow ten turnips before you call it a day, and listen to some sweet tunes.

This game was created and submitted for the Indie Tales 2021 Game Jam (July 2021) for which the theme was "One Room". 

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Pick up / throw / interact / dash


Credits
